alert.change_theme.title: Theme selected
alert.change_theme.body: A reload is required to see the selected theme. Do you want to reload now?
alert.log_out.title: Log out
alert.log_out.body: Are you sure you want to log out of Cloud Sync?
alert.delete_data.title: Delete data
alert.delete_data.body: Are you sure you want to delete your save data? (this cannot be undone!)
alert.save_data.title: Save data
alert.save_data.body: Are you sure you want to overwrite your save data? (this cannot be undone!)
alert.encryption_key.title: Enter encryption key
alert.encryption_key.required: An encryption key must be set.
alert.decryption_key.title: Enter decryption key
alert.decryption_key.required: A decryption key must be set.
alert.unproxied_plugin_warn.title: Warning
alert.unproxied_plugin_warn.body: Installing unproxied plugins can be dangerous since they haven't been verified by Vendetta staff. Are you sure you want to import them?
alert.plugin_settings_revert.title: Revert Settings
alert.plugin_settings_revert.body: Are you sure you want to revert all plugin settings?
log.import.result.success: Finished! Imported $plugins and $themes. All imports were successful.
log.import.result.fail: Finished! Imported $plugins and $themes. Failed to import $failed_plugins and $failed_themes.
